page_not_supported_description: Sorry, this page is not supported or doesn't exist. Please return to the home page to continue browsing.
something_went_wrong_description: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try again.
error_404_description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
error_403_description: You don't have permission to access this page.
error_500_description: Something went wrong on our end. We're working to fix it.
error_network_description: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection.
error_timeout_description: The request took too long to complete. Please try again.
error_unauthorized_description: You need to be logged in to access this page.
error_loading_description: Failed to load the requested content.
error_validation_description: Please check your input and try again.
